name: Minion Magnets
description:
This is a prototype made in mine and Alex's  24 hour game dev challenge called Minion Magnets

The goal is to survive as long as you can

Drag body parts into the death pit to earn currency

Controls

[WASD] Movement

[Left Click] Shoot

[Right Click] Magnetize

[TAB] Toggle laptop

[Q/E] Tab through laptop

[F] Purchase upgrade

[Alt + F4] Quit

Performance may not be good as you play because there is no limit for the amount of Ai there can be. There's no menu and no pausing sooo good luck!

Click here to play my competitor Alex's game 

Please vote here

When you are done voting, check out the updated game! It fixes a lot of issues and includes a lot more features than this prototype

If you've just so happened to stumble upon this game without watching the intended video check it out to see why & how it was made!
